title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
OB: When switching perspectives, the CVS repository view is no longer maximized.
EB: The CVS repository view should stay maximized even after switching perspectives.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the CVS repository view.
2. Maximize the view.
3. Switch perspectives.
4. Observe that the CVS repository view is no longer maximized.
